item.title: BSX
item.description: score:12 Chances: Boston Scientific’s (BSX) FARAPULSE System Study Data Positive Boston Scientific Surges As It Looks To Enter A Market Worth Nearly $8 Billion Boston Scientific Leads the S&P 500 Boston Scientific Reports Positive Results from Atrial Fibrillation Device ADVENT Study of the FARAPULSEâ„¢ Pulsed Field Ablation System Meets Primary Efficacy and Safety Endpoints Risks: Boston Scientific Stock Gets 81 RS Rating After Profit Pops 56% In Year EVP & Grp Pres, MedSurg & APAC Arthur Butcher Sells 6,600 Shares of Boston Scientific … Ozempic Is All the Rage.
